医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
HBO 的《最后生还者》真菌启示录，科幻小说，而非未来现实“新发传染病”的研究人员揭穿了 HBO 的《最后生还者》中描述的全球真菌大流行的情景，称缓慢的真菌进化和当前的病理学是此类事件发生的障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/HBOs-The-Last-of-Us-fungal-apocalypse-science-fiction-not-future-reality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/HBOs-The-Last-of-Us-fungal-apocalypse-science-fiction-not-future-reality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6da0abf3-d783-48ab-b83c-4a3fe18060a4 Thu, 15 Feb 2024 16:57:00 -0500 HBO's 'The Last of Us' fungal apocalypse, science fiction, not future reality
研究表明，感染艾滋病毒的女性会加速 DNA 老化罗格斯大学公共卫生学院生物统计和流行病学系助理教授 Stephanie Shiau 领导的一项研究表明，感染艾滋病毒的女性会经历 DNA 加速老化，这种现象可能导致身体机能下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Women-with-HIV-experience-accelerated-DNA-aging-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Women-with-HIV-experience-accelerated-DNA-aging-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8276db30-1261-40cf-888f-03ad773cbc85 Thu, 15 Feb 2024 12:44:17 -0500 Women with HIV experience accelerated DNA aging, study shows
麦吉尔研究揭示了精确伤口敷料应用的潜力水凝胶是一种工程材料，可以吸收和保留水分，目前用于各种医学治疗，包括包扎伤口。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/McGill-study-unveils-pottial-for-precise-wound-dressing-applications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/McGill-study-unveils-pottial-for-precise-wound-dressing-applications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93924718-22dc-4318-9635-a39753816f02 Thu, 15 Feb 2024 12:32:53 -0500 McGill study unveils potential for precise wound dressing applications
新工具可以识别倦怠的早期预警信号已经开发出一种新工具来识别倦怠的早期预警信号。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/New-tool-can-identify-early-warning-signs-of-burnout.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/New-tool-can-identify-early-warning-signs-of-burnout.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=301898ed-f10e-454f-9b95-8ad1711cb5ca Thu, 15 Feb 2024 12:27:13 -0500 New tool can identify early warning signs of burnout
2023 年英格兰结核病病例激增 10.7%英国卫生安全局 (UKHSA) 今天在其结核病年度报告中发布的数据显示，2022 年英格兰的结核病病例与 2021 年相比保持稳定（2022 年为 4,380 例，2021 年为 4,411 例）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/TB-cases-in-England-spike-by-10725-in-2023.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/TB-cases-in-England-spike-by-10725-in-2023.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9788576d-fac1-4ab3-9905-e15467f16434 Thu, 15 Feb 2024 12:02:44 -0500 TB cases in England spike by 10.7% in 2023
育儿策略可以减轻精力旺盛的孩子多动症的发展滑铁卢大学研究人员共同撰写的一项新研究表明，性格易激动或旺盛的幼儿的父母可以调整他们的养育方式，以帮助缓解孩子注意力缺陷/多动症（ADHD）的潜在发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Parenting-strategies-may-mitigate-ADHD-development-in-exuberant-kids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Parenting-strategies-may-mitigate-ADHD-development-in-exuberant-kids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d5b52db-a4ce-49e8-80b5-4f93fcd2350a Thu, 15 Feb 2024 11:58:31 -0500 Parenting strategies may mitigate ADHD development in exuberant kids
研究指出单纯疱疹病毒是痴呆症的危险因素一生中曾感染过疱疹病毒的人患痴呆症的可能性是从未感染过的人的两倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Study-points-to-herpes-simplex-virus-as-a-risk-factor-for-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Study-points-to-herpes-simplex-virus-as-a-risk-factor-for-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b9c3520-b350-44ec-a887-ff79f2e998e6 Thu, 15 Feb 2024 10:28:15 -0500 Study points to herpes simplex virus as a risk factor for dementia
您对生孩子的可能性有何担忧？ 16-18岁学生育儿意愿调查研究人员对英国 16 至 18 岁的本科生进行了调查，了解他们成为父母的计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/What-are-your-concerns-about-the-possibility-of-having-children-Survey-of-parenthood-intentions-for-16e2809318-year-老学生.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/What-are-your-concerns-about-the-possibility-of-having-children-Survey-of-parenthood-intentions-for-16e2809318-year-老学生.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f9b407bb-8ccd-489d-b8d7-5488818d2039 Thu, 15 Feb 2024 10:11:00 -0500 What are your concerns about the possibility of having children? Survey of parenthood intentions for 16–18-year-old students
利用 iPSC 技术突破新的研究障碍在本次采访中，我们采访了 Fujifilm Cellular Dynamics 的 Keith Olson 和 Coby Carlson，了解他们的 iPSC 技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Breaking-through-new-research-barriers-with-iPSC-technology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Breaking-through-new-research-barriers-with-iPSC-technology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7e4b50a-161b-448f-b2cf-4c59e5f0bed0 Thu, 15 Feb 2024 09:53:00 -0500 Breaking through new research barriers with iPSC technology
维也纳医科大学的科学家发现了慢性疲劳综合症的可能生物标志物据估计，奥地利有多达 80,000 人患有慢性疲劳综合症，也称为 ME/CFS 或肌痛性脑脊髓炎/慢性疲劳综合症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/MedUni-Vienna-scientists-identify-possible-biomarkers-for-chronic-fatigue-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/MedUni-Vienna-scientists-identify-possible-biomarkers-for-chronic-fatigue-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ebc0947f-091e-4c0b-b774-3ddcc8a5ecfe Thu, 15 Feb 2024 09:52:43 -0500 MedUni Vienna scientists identify possible biomarkers for chronic fatigue syndrome
